column5: OK, help me out guys.  I want a good night before xmas fishing poem.  I'll start the first line, please add yours.  "Twas the night before X-mas, and on OFC........"  (your turn.)  Pam
all fisherman were busy catching last minute presents. ??? not much, not even that funny....
Poetry ISU due in 5 days.... Academic English Stream... Honours in English....  And I got nothing!  Why? Because english is the easiest subject to Bull, and im pretty good at it.
i got a biology project i just finished up, phewww.

Kemper do you mean Poetry or B.S?  Or are they the same thing LOL.  J/K  Post a couple sonnets to help out PD.  "and all thru the ice hut not a tip up was stirring, not even a nibble.  The waders were hung by the chimney with care in hopes that the bite would soon be there.  The anglers were nestled all snug in their Mustangs while visions of 60 plus muskies all danced in their heads.  When out on the roof there arose such a clatter I arose from my bunk to see what was the matter. It was TJ and 6 tiny...."

So far, it goes like this,  "Twas the night before X-mas, and on OFC........ all fisherman were busy catching last minute presents.  and all thru the ice hut not a tip up was stirring, not even a nibble.  The waders were hung by the chimney with care in hopes that the bite would soon be there.  The anglers were nestled all snug in their Mustangs while visions of 60 plus muskies all danced in their heads.  When out on the roof there arose such a clatter I arose from my bunk to see what was the matter. It was TJ and 6 tiny....
mods dressed up in tutus saying yoohoo!!
Also someone did this a couple years back on the old board and it was hilarious. Not sure who but for some reason I thought it was GaryV.

So far, it goes like this,  OFC XMAS  "Twas the night before X-mas, and on OFC........ all fisherman were busy catching last minute presents.  and all thru the ice hut not a tip up was stirring, not even a nibble.  The waders were hung by the chimney with care in hopes that the bite would soon be there.  The anglers were nestled all snug in their Mustangs while visions of 60 plus muskies all danced in their heads.  When out on the roof there arose such a clatter I arose from my bunk to see what was the matter.  It was TJ and 6 tiny mods dressed up in tutus saying yoohoo!!
